description:
This year is the 450th anniversary of Oda Nobunaga taking Gifu castle. Conan, Ayumi, Genta, Mitsuhiko, Haibara, and Professor Agasa have come to Gifu City to enjoy the events celebrating the anniversary. At night, Conan and his friends go to watch the five-man origami fighting squad, the Nobuna Gaizers. Mitsuhiko loves local heroes. After returning to their hotel, Mitsuhiko leaves to get the autographs of the Nobuna Gaizers but goes missing. Meanwhile, the history museum is robbed. The security cameras captured the Nobuna Gaizers stealing objects from the exhibits...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ノブナガ四五〇[よんごうまる]事件
